On this page

Project Roadmap ​

This document tracks large features on the engineering roadmap. This is not an authoritative document - we have internal project management and roadmaps. It's mainly here to reduce questions.

Note: It should not be assumed that the architecture is 'set' based on this roadmap. We have many other features that might appear down the road.

Planned Features ​

  • [ ] AWS C series support
  • [ ] SMP (Symmetric Multi-Processing)
  • [ ] ESX hypervisor support
  • [ ] Hyper-V hypervisor support

Feature Development ​

For the latest development work and active issues, see the GitHub repository.
